description: This file contains styles for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend, defining visual themes and layout properties for various components.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Styles and layout for the main game container.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Styles for the game board layout.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares on the Tic Tac Toe board.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Styles for the control panel containing buttons.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Styles for buttons used in the game.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for displaying game status messages.
